author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Enterprises Environment Group Says To Acquire 51% Of Beijing Xindi Garden Group Ltd

organizations.name: brief-beijing enterprises environment group says to acquire 51% of beijing xindi garden group ltd
reuters) - beijing enterprises environment group ltd

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Beijing Enterprises Environment Group Ltd:
* CO TO ACQUIRE 51% EQUITY INTEREST OF BEIJING XINDI GARDEN GROUP LTD FOR RMB29 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
